creator: LogiNext
descriptionHtml:
LogiNext Field helps companies optimize their on-field workforce such as sales professionals, field agents, medical representatives, service technicians, field engineers, banking and insurance agents, cash-replenishment custodians and agents, etc.

LogiNext FieldForce is the mobile application used by on-field agents to help them follow an optimized beat plan for their daily tasks. The application directs the field workforce through an optimized route which, in turn, helps them reach meetings and task locations on time. The application also helps them capture the exact service time spent at the location and the client’s feedback. Since the application is directly paired with the cloud, real-time tracking of all these parameters can be observed and managed by the supervisor back at the hub, center, or headquarters.

LogiNext FieldForce helps:

- Use real-time traffic and weather insights to follow scheduled tasks and service requests efficiently.
- Use machine learning capabilities of the application to identify accurate addresses and reduce the time spent on searching for the destination.
- Follow accurate estimated time of arrivals for each task; reduce delays for meetings; reduce overall time spent on-field.
- Maximize total tasks conducted in a day; increase overall field workforce efficiency.
- Capture on-field feedback from clients at the time of service fulfillment.

LogiNext FieldForce helps improve overall field workforce efficiency using route optimization and real-time tracking to better the beat planning and its on-ground execution. LogiNext’s comprehensive analytics reports cover every detail about each task assigned to each field agent. All this information is showcased in an easy to understand visual format for the supervisor.

LogiNext Field can be easily and quickly integrated with every leading ERP and all legacy MIS within enterprises. It can also be used as a standalone application to plan, track, optimize, and analyze the entire field workforce of a company.


About LogiNext:

LogiNext leads the field workforce and logistics optimization solutions market with its industry bench-marked products for last mile, field force, on-demand delivery, and linehaul express management.

With more than 150 enterprise clients across North America, Middle-East, South and Southeast Asia, LogiNext has been accepted as the fastest growing SaaS enterprise in logistics and field service optimization space.

********************************************************************************************

title: FieldForce | Field Service Optimization

creator: LogiNext
descriptionHtml:
LogiNext Field helps companies optimize their on-field workforce such as sales professionals, field agents, medical representatives, service technicians, field engineers, banking and insurance agents, cash-replenishment custodians and agents, etc.

LogiNext FieldForce is the mobile application used by on-field agents to help them follow an optimized beat plan for their daily tasks. The application directs the field workforce through an optimized route which, in turn, helps them reach meetings and task locations on time. The application also helps them capture the exact service time spent at the location and the client’s feedback. Since the application is directly paired with the cloud, real-time tracking of all these parameters can be observed and managed by the supervisor back at the hub, center, or headquarters.

LogiNext FieldForce helps:

- Use real-time traffic and weather insights to follow scheduled tasks and service requests efficiently.
- Use machine learning capabilities of the application to identify accurate addresses and reduce the time spent on searching for the destination.
- Follow accurate estimated time of arrivals for each task; reduce delays for meetings; reduce overall time spent on-field.
- Maximize total tasks conducted in a day; increase overall field workforce efficiency.
- Capture on-field feedback from clients at the time of service fulfillment.

LogiNext FieldForce helps improve overall field workforce efficiency using route optimization and real-time tracking to better the beat planning and its on-ground execution. LogiNext’s comprehensive analytics reports cover every detail about each task assigned to each field agent. All this information is showcased in an easy to understand visual format for the supervisor.

LogiNext Field can be easily and quickly integrated with every leading ERP and all legacy MIS within enterprises. It can also be used as a standalone application to plan, track, optimize, and analyze the entire field workforce of a company.


About LogiNext:

LogiNext leads the field workforce and logistics optimization solutions market with its industry bench-marked products for last mile, field force, on-demand delivery, and linehaul express management.

With more than 150 enterprise clients across North America, Middle-East, South and Southeast Asia, LogiNext has been accepted as the fastest growing SaaS enterprise in logistics and field service optimization space.

LogiNext Field helps companies optimize their on-field workforce such as sales professionals, field agents, medical representatives, service technicians, field engineers, banking and insurance agents, cash-replenishment custodians and agents, etc.

LogiNext FieldForce is the mobile application used by on-field agents to help them follow an optimized beat plan for their daily tasks. The application directs the field workforce through an optimized route which, in turn, helps them reach meetings and task locations on time. The application also helps them capture the exact service time spent at the location and the client’s feedback. Since the application is directly paired with the cloud, real-time tracking of all these parameters can be observed and managed by the supervisor back at the hub, center, or headquarters.

LogiNext FieldForce helps:

- Use real-time traffic and weather insights to follow scheduled tasks and service requests efficiently.
- Use machine learning capabilities of the application to identify accurate addresses and reduce the time spent on searching for the destination.
- Follow accurate estimated time of arrivals for each task; reduce delays for meetings; reduce overall time spent on-field.
- Maximize total tasks conducted in a day; increase overall field workforce efficiency.
- Capture on-field feedback from clients at the time of service fulfillment.

LogiNext FieldForce helps improve overall field workforce efficiency using route optimization and real-time tracking to better the beat planning and its on-ground execution. LogiNext’s comprehensive analytics reports cover every detail about each task assigned to each field agent. All this information is showcased in an easy to understand visual format for the supervisor.

LogiNext Field can be easily and quickly integrated with every leading ERP and all legacy MIS within enterprises. It can also be used as a standalone application to plan, track, optimize, and analyze the entire field workforce of a company.


About LogiNext:

LogiNext leads the field workforce and logistics optimization solutions market with its industry bench-marked products for last mile, field force, on-demand delivery, and linehaul express management.

With more than 150 enterprise clients across North America, Middle-East, South and Southeast Asia, LogiNext has been accepted as the fastest growing SaaS enterprise in logistics and field service optimization space.

********************************************************************************************

title: FieldForce | Field Service Optimization

creator: LogiNext
descriptionHtml:
LogiNext Field helps companies optimize their on-field workforce such as sales professionals, field agents, medical representatives, service technicians, field engineers, banking and insurance agents, cash-replenishment custodians and agents, etc.

LogiNext FieldForce is the mobile application used by on-field agents to help them follow an optimized beat plan for their daily tasks. The application directs the field workforce through an optimized route which, in turn, helps them reach meetings and task locations on time. The application also helps them capture the exact service time spent at the location and the client’s feedback. Since the application is directly paired with the cloud, real-time tracking of all these parameters can be observed and managed by the supervisor back at the hub, center, or headquarters.

LogiNext FieldForce helps:

- Use real-time traffic and weather insights to follow scheduled tasks and service requests efficiently.
- Use machine learning capabilities of the application to identify accurate addresses and reduce the time spent on searching for the destination.
- Follow accurate estimated time of arrivals for each task; reduce delays for meetings; reduce overall time spent on-field.
- Maximize total tasks conducted in a day; increase overall field workforce efficiency.
- Capture on-field feedback from clients at the time of service fulfillment.

LogiNext FieldForce helps improve overall field workforce efficiency using route optimization and real-time tracking to better the beat planning and its on-ground execution. LogiNext’s comprehensive analytics reports cover every detail about each task assigned to each field agent. All this information is showcased in an easy to understand visual format for the supervisor.

LogiNext Field can be easily and quickly integrated with every leading ERP and all legacy MIS within enterprises. It can also be used as a standalone application to plan, track, optimize, and analyze the entire field workforce of a company.


About LogiNext:

LogiNext leads the field workforce and logistics optimization solutions market with its industry bench-marked products for last mile, field force, on-demand delivery, and linehaul express management.

With more than 150 enterprise clients across North America, Middle-East, South and Southeast Asia, LogiNext has been accepted as the fastest growing SaaS enterprise in logistics and field service optimization space.

LogiNext Field helps companies optimize their on-field workforce such as sales professionals, field agents, medical representatives, service technicians, field engineers, banking and insurance agents, cash-replenishment custodians and agents, etc.

LogiNext FieldForce is the mobile application used by on-field agents to help them follow an optimized beat plan for their daily tasks. The application directs the field workforce through an optimized route which, in turn, helps them reach meetings and task locations on time. The application also helps them capture the exact service time spent at the location and the client’s feedback. Since the application is directly paired with the cloud, real-time tracking of all these parameters can be observed and managed by the supervisor back at the hub, center, or headquarters.

LogiNext FieldForce helps:

- Use real-time traffic and weather insights to follow scheduled tasks and service requests efficiently.
- Use machine learning capabilities of the application to identify accurate addresses and reduce the time spent on searching for the destination.
- Follow accurate estimated time of arrivals for each task; reduce delays for meetings; reduce overall time spent on-field.
- Maximize total tasks conducted in a day; increase overall field workforce efficiency.
- Capture on-field feedback from clients at the time of service fulfillment.

LogiNext FieldForce helps improve overall field workforce efficiency using route optimization and real-time tracking to better the beat planning and its on-ground execution. LogiNext’s comprehensive analytics reports cover every detail about each task assigned to each field agent. All this information is showcased in an easy to understand visual format for the supervisor.

LogiNext Field can be easily and quickly integrated with every leading ERP and all legacy MIS within enterprises. It can also be used as a standalone application to plan, track, optimize, and analyze the entire field workforce of a company.


About LogiNext:

LogiNext leads the field workforce and logistics optimization solutions market with its industry bench-marked products for last mile, field force, on-demand delivery, and linehaul express management.

With more than 150 enterprise clients across North America, Middle-East, South and Southeast Asia, LogiNext has been accepted as the fastest growing SaaS enterprise in logistics and field service optimization space.

********************************************************************************************

title: FieldForce | Field Service Opt

creator: LogiNext
descriptionHtml:
LogiNext Field helps companies optimize their on-field workforce such as sales professionals, field agents, medical representatives, service technicians, field engineers, banking and insurance agents, cash-replenishment custodians and agents, etc.

LogiNext FieldForce is the mobile application used by on-field agents to help them follow an optimized beat plan for their daily tasks. The application directs the field workforce through an optimized route which, in turn, helps them reach meetings and task locations on time. The application also helps them capture the exact service time spent at the location and the client’s feedback. Since the application is directly paired with the cloud, real-time tracking of all these parameters can be observed and managed by the supervisor back at the hub, center, or headquarters.

LogiNext FieldForce helps:

- Use real-time traffic and weather insights to follow scheduled tasks and service requests efficiently.
- Use machine learning capabilities of the application to identify accurate addresses and reduce the time spent on searching for the destination.
- Follow accurate estimated time of arrivals for each task; reduce delays for meetings; reduce overall time spent on-field.
- Maximize total tasks conducted in a day; increase overall field workforce efficiency.
- Capture on-field feedback from clients at the time of service fulfillment.

LogiNext FieldForce helps improve overall field workforce efficiency using route optimization and real-time tracking to better the beat planning and its on-ground execution. LogiNext’s comprehensive analytics reports cover every detail about each task assigned to each field agent. All this information is showcased in an easy to understand visual format for the supervisor.

LogiNext Field can be easily and quickly integrated with every leading ERP and all legacy MIS within enterprises. It can also be used as a standalone application to plan, track, optimize, and analyze the entire field workforce of a company.


About LogiNext:

LogiNext leads the field workforce and logistics optimization solutions market with its industry bench-marked products for last mile, field force, on-demand delivery, and linehaul express management.

With more than 150 enterprise clients across North America, Middle-East, South and Southeast Asia, LogiNext has been accepted as the fastest growing SaaS enterprise in logistics and field service optimization space.

LogiNext Field helps companies optimize their on-field workforce such as sales professionals, field agents, medical representatives, service technicians, field engineers, banking and insurance agents, cash-replenishment custodians and agents, etc.

LogiNext FieldForce is the mobile application used by on-field agents to help them follow an optimized beat plan for their daily tasks. The application directs the field workforce through an optimized route which, in turn, helps them reach meetings and task locations on time. The application also helps them capture the exact service time spent at the location and the client’s feedback. Since the application is directly paired with the cloud, real-time tracking of all these parameters can be observed and managed by the supervisor back at the hub, center, or headquarters.

LogiNext FieldForce helps:

- Use real-time traffic and weather insights to follow scheduled tasks and service requests efficiently.
- Use machine learning capabilities of the application to identify accurate addresses and reduce the time spent on searching for the destination.
- Follow accurate estimated time of arrivals for each task; reduce delays for meetings; reduce overall time spent on-field.
- Maximize total tasks conducted in a day; increase overall field workforce efficiency.
- Capture on-field feedback from clients at the time of service fulfillment.

LogiNext FieldForce helps improve overall field workforce efficiency using route optimization and real-time tracking to better the beat planning and its on-ground execution. LogiNext’s comprehensive analytics reports cover every detail about each task assigned to each field agent. All this information is showcased in an easy to understand visual format for the supervisor.

LogiNext Field can be easily and quickly integrated with every leading ERP and all legacy MIS within enterprises. It can also be used as a standalone application to plan, track, optimize, and analyze the entire field workforce of a company.


About LogiNext:

LogiNext leads the field workforce and logistics optimization solutions market with its industry bench-marked products for last mile, field force, on-demand delivery, and linehaul express management.

With more than 150 enterprise clients across North America, Middle-East, South and Southeast Asia, LogiNext has been accepted as the fastest growing SaaS enterprise in logistics and field service optimization space.

********************************************************************************************
